statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ -4 \\ 0 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 1 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ -7 \\ -6 \\ 2 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ 29 \\ 17 \\ -9 \\ 13 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
